pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fetch Data from the Federal Reserve Economic Database // Interact with the FRED API, https://fred.stlouisfed.org/docs/api/fred/, to fetch observations across economic series; find information about different economic sources, releases, series, etc.; conduct searches by series name, attributes, or tags; and determine the latest updates. Includes functions for creating panels of related variables with minimal effort and datasets containing data sources, releases, and popular FRED tags.
